long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Twizzy allows you to track your followed live streams and channels outside of Twitch. You can also add channels to a "Favorites" category which shows pinned on the top of Twitch's live channels list. It's also compatible with 7TV and other popular Twitch extensions.

--

PRIVACY NOTICE:

All the data is stored locally on your machine and used merely for functionality purposes. The extension is powered by official Twitch APIs, however, it's not afiliated with Twitch and/or Amazon.

*** ALPHA versions doesn't include all functionalities and are still under testing/development. ***
